full_output.summary: Enthusiastic B.Tech student passionate about full-stack web development. With a solid foundation in both front-end and back- end technologies, I am committed to build innovative and user-friendly web applications. My academic journey and hands-on projects have honed my skills in creating seamless and efficient solutions, ensuring an exceptional user experience. I am eager to contribute my dedication and expertise to a dynamic team, impactful projects and drive business success. Seeking a challenging opportunity to apply my full-stack development skills in a collaborative environment that values creativity and growth.

projects.name: Full-Stack MERN Blog
projects.description: Developed a comprehensive blog platform utilizing the MERN stack (MongoDB, Express.js, React.js, Node.js). The application features dynamic article management and a commenting system, allowing users to view, interact with, and comment on blog content. Comments are displayed under each article, and newly added comments appear below the existing ones. The site is fully responsive, ensuring compatibility across various devices and screen sizes. Successfully deployed on Vercel.

projects.name: Full-Stack Website Development for Maav Solutions
projects.description: Developed a Full-Stack dynamic website for a startup company called Maav Solutions. Successfully deployed on the internet, the website is smooth, responsive, and compatible with various devices and resolutions.

projects.name: Digital Solutions for Digital Life
projects.description: Designed and developed a responsive website for Digital Solutions for Digital Like, a software services company. The site features a clean, professional design and user-friendly navigation, reflecting the companys brand. The client was extremely satisfied with the results, and the project significantly enhanced my front-end development skills.

projects.name: AI-Powered Chatbot
projects.description: Developed an advanced chatbot leveraging natural language processing for effective customer support. Implemented with the OpenAI API to understand and respond to user queries in a conversational manner. Integrated seamlessly with backend systems to provide real-time, contextually relevant interactions. The chatbot enhances user experience by offering prompt, accurate responses and streamlined support.

projects.name: Plant Disease Detector using Deep Learning
projects.description: Developed a convolutional neural network (CNN) model achieving 87.3% accuracy in identifying plant diseases from plant leaf images.Utilized transfer learning and data augmentation techniques for improved performance and better results.

experiences.description: Developed an Inventories Management System with real-time data synchronization, OTP authentication for added security, and a user-friendly interface. Enhanced the systems scalability and performance through responsive design and efficient backend architecture.

Completed various Salesforce Trailhead modules including Salesforce Fundamentals, Organizational Setup, Relationship & Process Automation, Types Of Flows & Security, Apex, Testing & Debugging, VS Code Setup & CLI Setup, Lightning Web Components (LWC) & API, Super Badge - Apex Specialist, and Super Badge - Developer Super Set.

full_output.name: Thummala Pramod Kumar
